Welcome, and hello from Kyoto.

I am so incredibly tired after touring today, but I managed to get a good 
amount of Shinsengumi stuff, including a banner and a figurine of Kondo 
Isami.

The Okita Soji lighters were really cool looking, but I didn't get one. 
Maybe next time...

-M.
